thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Gayle and Chris
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Gayle and Chris

author: Gayle and Chris
title: Gayle and Chris
text: Your agent Anthony Baliviera was amazing:- very easy to talk to, understanding,always available, explained things well,empathetic and achieved an OUTSTANDING result for us. Thanks Anthony. Other contacts within the agency eg receptionist, house photographer, draftsman, etc, were very helpful and pleasant people to deal with. Well done all. Happy to recommend Nelson Alexander.
